subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Weather
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray defeated Tomas Berdych in four sets, but severe weather conditions caused the day’s other two big matches — the second men’s semifinal and the women’s final — to be postponed.
snippet: Andy Murray defeated Tomas Berdych in four sets, but severe weather conditions caused the day’s other two big matches — the second men’s semifinal and the women’s final — to be postponed.
